short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom themes and creative tools for ALX Holberton School intranet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Collection of Stunning Themes and Creative Tools to Enhance Students Intranet Experience.

Features:
✅ Stunning Themes (8 well-crafted themes and yours could be next!)
✅ In-Task Code Highlighting
✅ Modern UI
✅ Focus Mode
